public class ques8 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int i,count=1;
		for(i=1;;i++)
		{
			
			if(60*i%7==1)
			{
				if(count==1 || count==2 || count==4)
		System.out.println(60*i);
				count++;
				
				if(count > 4)
				break;
			}
		}

	}

}
